1647: Please have the following information available, where possible, when making a claim:
1648: Property Claims Your contact information, including address and telephone numbers Policy type and policy number Date the loss occurred Location and description of the loss
1649: Injury Claims Your contact information, including address and telephone numbers Policy type and policy number Date the loss occurred Name and address of injured party Description of the injury, where and how it occurred
1650: Commercial Legal Expenses Claims Your contact information, including address and telephone numbers Master Policy reference shown in the policy schedule Brief summary of the problem
